McKinney.Franconia Brewing Company:
Franconia Brewing Company is a brewery in McKinney, Texas, USA. The brew master, Dennis Wehrmann, is an experienced brewer from Nuremberg, Franconia, Germany, with a family history in the brewing industry.
Dennis started building Franconia in 2007, and on February 26, 2008, they produced their first batch of beer. 
As of December 2011, Franconia beers are available statewide through distributor Ben E. Keith.
